name: Demolish the Building
description:
By Rocky X. and Jacob Y.

Demolish the building! But be careful, the building is easy to collapse due to the temperamental wind and your demolishing order. The more building pieces fall, the more point you will lose.

A/S to move the excavating machine
D/E to move arm 1
H/J to move arm 2
K/L to move the bucket
Space to open/close the bucket
Alt to switch the direction of the excavating machine

Sound effects: paulw2k, Jedo, and liriy.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
